topic.title: Adding a Logo Image in the Title Area

keywords.indexterm: Customizing WebHelp Systems add logo image in title area

body.p:
To customize the title area of your WebHelp output, follow this procedure:
Edit a WebHelp transformation scenario (DITA or DocBook), then open the Parameters tab.
Specify the path to your logo in the webhelp.logo.image parameter.
If you also want to add a link to your website, set the URL in the webhelp.logo.image.target.url parameter.
Run the transformation scenario. This procedure does not apply to WebHelp Mobile transformation scenarios.
